metadata.title: CVE-2017-5194 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in Irssi before 0.8.21 allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (crash) via an invalid nick message.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5194` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

irssi - 0.8.15-5ubuntu3.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: irssi package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.15-5ubuntu3.1').
